EmailTemplate.description: DCR-292-Claimant receives a Request for reply email notification for an application submitted
EmailTemplate.name: CTP-ClaimantReceivesRequestReplyEmailNotificationForAnApplicationSubmitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Additional Information Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In considering the Application and Reply, it appears that there is some further information which, if available, may well assist the Merit Reviewer in making the decision.
Please follow this link to review the request https://ctpdev04-ctpdev04.cs57.force.com/public/s/casedetail?recordId={!Case.CaseNumber}
If you have any queries, please contact mrs@sira.nsw.gov.au or call us on (02 9284 2284)
. Yours sincerely Merit Review Service
